title: Quiero Saber
lyrics:
Worldwide
Armando
Ludacris
Prince Royce
You know we had to bring it back
Rewriting history

Dale



Quiero saber cuando te voy volviera ver (I wanna know)

Quiero saber cuando es la proxima vez



Yo se que te gusta mamacita, como te doy lo que tu necesitas

Te prendo y te derritas

[?] even deeper, yeah

Como lo hacíamos antes, como amigos, no como amantes

Tal complicado y sencillo

She said oooh we still down for the ride? (oh I'm down)

[?]

Tanta posiciones descubrimos, podemos ser un lio



Quiero saber cuando te voy volviera ver (I wanna know)

Quiero saber cuando es la proxima vez



It's what ever whenever, whatever with whoever, I'm ready with Beddy, with jenny with Lany, with Bonnie with Cammie, with Yammy

Your sister, your mami, your aunty

She want it, I'm with it don't stop get it-get it work that pretty kitty

You need it? I got it, believe me [?]

I'm rollin [?] bone it, and ride it

El locito Armandito te da un besito en tu ombliguito

Te saca el mojito, te vuelvo locita, I'm gone

Estos muchachitos hablan mucho y no hacen' na

Ponle taquito en los huevitos, dale mamita

Yo soy hombre hecho, y ere hecho animal

Lucadris, Armando, Prince Royce sing this song



Quiero saber cuando te voy volviera ver (I wanna know)

Quiero saber cuando es la proxima vez



Luda!

I'm back and I'm better

They want me more now than ever

I told them I came to save the day

In fact, I'm a rebel I still got all of this cheddar and women, know that the boys don't play

Love it how I position your sill putty arms

Your legs will turn into twizzlers

Kissin' your body soft

From your head to your toes, to your forehead

May just come up missin'

Police will be sending code reds

Its an emergency, loving you is in an urgency

Purposely call me nutty professor stronger than Hercules

Dama, mi amor, can you be my señorita?

You speak Spanish? I say 'si mamacita'



Quiero saber, (quiero saber) cuando te voy volviera ver (I wanna know)

Quiero saber cuando es la proxima vez



You know we gettin live off that Voli 305

Royce, Ludapit yeah them boys gon' ride

Remakin' history one more time, yeah thats right

You know we gettin live off that Voli 305

Royce, Ludapit yeah them boys gon' ride

Remakin' history one more time, yeah thats right
